data.route_analysis: Direct flights available from major cities; local transport options include buses and shuttles.
data.pricing_trends: Average travel costs are lower in the rainy season; prices rise during peak tourist months.
data.seasonal_patterns: Best months for visiting are from September to November due to pleasant weather.
data.booking_windows: Best to book 1-3 months in advance for optimal pricing.

destination_insights.route_analysis: Direct flights available from major cities; local transport options include buses and shuttles.
destination_insights.seasonal_patterns: Best months for visiting are from September to November due to pleasant weather.
destination_insights.climate: Climate varies from tropical in the lowlands to temperate in highlands; recommend lightweight clothing and rain gear.
destination_insights.culture: Rich cultural heritage with Mayan ruins, colonial architecture, and vibrant festivals.
destination_insights.attractions: Must-visit sites include Antigua, Lake Atitlan, and Tikal temples.

market_insights.pricing_trends: Average travel costs are lower in the rainy season; prices rise during peak tourist months.
market_insights.booking_windows: Best to book 1-3 months in advance for optimal pricing.
market_insights.demand: Increasing interest in eco-tourism and cultural heritage trips.
market_insights.competition: Guanajuato, Costa Rica, and Belize are alternative options for travelers looking for similar experiences.

trend_insights.market_trends: Growing trend towards sustainable travel and cultural tourism.
trend_insights.consumer_behavior: Travelers are increasingly researching destinations online before booking.
trend_insights.competitive_landscape: Key competitors include other Central American destinations like Costa Rica and Belize.
trend_insights.seasonal_factors: Fall season attracts more visitors due to festivals and events, notably in Antigua.
